EmailTemplate.name: NavDB Aviation Services Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aviation Services. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this email - please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses and include the 3-character NavDB IDENT and relevant cycle date in all correspondence.
For all your queries related to NavDB Accounts please contact our Accounts Team at dsa@Honeywell.com or 1-855-808-6500 (U.S. or Canada) or 1-602-365-6500 (Int'l).
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact the Technical Operations Center at 1-855-808-6500 (U.S. or Canada) or 1-602-365-6500 (Int'l), use Option 1, or AeroTechSupport@Honeywell.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE:
{!Case.Description}
